A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Massive plot holes\, terrible jokes\, the make Mark Hamill look like an idiot\, Rey doesn't need training as she is too perfect. Poe and Rose go on a pointless adventure that really has nothing to do with the story\, space fuel has never been an issue until now of coarse\, and nothing has happen since the last movie because the writers have no imagination.
